structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-49. County communications facilities.
With regard to underground construction, the licensee shall provide and install, in a common trench with its facilities, or in a separate trench if requested, County services conduit as specified by the County. Prior to installation of any fiber optic cable, the licensee shall notify the County of its intention and, at the County's request, the licensee shall provide and install such additional fiber optic strands or cable as the County specifies for its use. The additional cost to the licensee will be borne by the County. The licensee will not be required to maintain the County equipment and facilities.
